display.title: Other Details
display.body: 39.62cm(15.6”) LED-backlit Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 matte display

display.title: Advanced Display Features
display.body: Advanced three-sided NanoEdge display with 86% screen-to-body ratio, 178° wide-view technology, ASUS Eye Care technology for up to 30% blue-light reduction

connectivity.title: Wireless
connectivity.body: Wi-fi Master: Dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi with advanced Wi-Fi Master technology

physical_specs.title: Colors Available
physical_specs.body: Icicle Gold | Gun Metal | Silver Blue | Star Grey | Firmament Green

physical_specs.title: Ports and Sensors
physical_specs.body: COMBO Audio Jack : 1 | Type-A USB 3.1 : 1 | USB 2.0 Port(s) : 2 | HDMI : 1 | Type-C™ USB 3.1 Gen 1 : 1 | MicroSD card reader : 1

processor.title: Processor Details
processor.body: 1.8GHz quad-core with Turbo boost (up to 4.0GHz) and 8MB cache

power.title: Adapter
power.body: 65W Power Adapter, Input : 100 -240 V AC, 50/60 Hz universal | Output : 19V DC, 3.42 A, 65W

sound.title: Audio Details
sound.body: ASUS SonicMaster stereo audio system with surround-sound, smart amplifier for maximum audio performance | Array microphone with Cortana voice-recognition support | 3.5mm headphone jack

other_specs.title: Fingerprint
other_specs.body: Glass-covered with integrated fingerprint sensor supporting Windows Hello; intelligent palm-rejection

other_specs.title: Touchpad
other_specs.body: Precision touchpad (PTP) technology supports up to four-finger smart gestures

other_specs.title: Manufacturer Warranty
other_specs.body: 1-year limited International hardware warranty. (Different by country)

pre_installed_apps.title: ASUS Apps
pre_installed_apps.body: ASUS Splendid, ASUS Eye Care, ASUS Tru2life Video, ASUS AudioWizard
